author: sjppotts
title: Hotel experience
text:
The hotel Trevi is in an ideal location for sightseeing and only a few metres from the bustle of the Trevi fountain.
You have the main hotel and then blocks of apartments/ rooms a few metres up the road but do not let this put you off as these rooms are located in quirky buildings with shared private court yards.
All rooms are very clean and a good size with ensuite, a/c, hair dryer, fridge, TV, free WiFi and free safe.
The breakfast choice is excellent with hot drinks, cold juices, fresh fruit, fresh breads / rolls, full continental and full hot breakfast choices are available too.
All staff were polite, friendly and helpful but top marks for the man at reception who provided maps, directions, tips on the best tours and made our time in Rome hassle free.
Ok!! Officially It may be a 3-4 Star hotel and the rooms are basic but very comfortable including the bed.
No swimming pool or Spa and if it did then likely it would be a 4-5 Star.
But for us... it was a 5 Star hotel because the quality of service and good foods for breakfast was excellent.
Hope you find our review helpful.
